text: is a Japanese television jidaigeki or period drama that was broadcast in 1978 to 1979. It is the 14th in the Hissatsu series. The drama depicts Paranormal events so totally different from past Hissastu series However, the audience rating was low and broadcast period was shortened.山田誠二 必殺シリーズ完全百科 p115 ==Plot== ==Cast== *Atsuo Nakamura as Sensei *Etsuko Ichihara as Obasan *Shōhei Hino as Shōjyu *Akiko Wada as Waka *Ayukawa Izumi as Onemu ==References== Category:1970 Japanese television series debuts Category:1970s drama television series Category:Jidaigeki television series
title: Tobe Hissatsu Uragoroshi
